definitions.definition: The science , technique , or process used to make a classification .
A classification ; especially , a classification in a hierarchical system .
The science of finding, describing, classifying and naming organisms .

main_definition: The science , technique , or process used to make a classification .
secondary_definitions: A classification ; especially , a classification in a hierarchical system .
( life sciences , uncountable ) The science of finding, describing, classifying and naming organisms .
